title._content: [Portrait of William P. Gottlieb, Washington, D.C., between 1938 and 1948] (LOC)

description._content: Gottlieb, Delia Potofsky, photographer. [Portrait of William P. Gottlieb, Washington, D.C., between 1938 and 1948] 1 negative : b&w ; 3 1/4 x 4 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 376 Reference print available in Music Division, Library of Congress. Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Gottlieb, William P. News photographers--1930-1950. Music critics--1930-1950. Format: Portrait photographs--1930-1950. Film negatives--1930-1950. Rights Info: Mr. Gottlieb has dedicated these works to the public domain, but rights of privacy and publicity may apply. lcweb2.loc.gov/diglib/ihas/html/gottlieb/gottlieb-copyrig...
